title: World Cancer Day
shortDescription: Annual events and activities to mark World Cancer Day on February 4th.
fullDescription: Every year on February 4th, we organize special events to mark World Cancer Day. These events aim to inspire action, raise awareness, and reduce stigma around cancer in the Tibetan community. Our World Cancer Day activities include educational sessions, survivor testimonials, memorial ceremonies, and community engagement initiatives that promote cancer prevention and support.
features: Memorial ceremonies for those lost to cancer
